introduction.head: Introduction:
introduction.body: I am a Junior Web Developer and a 3rd-year university student, who is looking forward to work at your company. Iam an ambitious, goal-oriented, receptive person, who iswilling to work and learn.

university.name: University of Pécs
university.body: Thanks to my University, I have gained some experience in many programming languages since 2022. I have always been a diligent student, and always passed in all IT subjects. I expect only one year until graduation, and I would stay at your company too!

misc.title: I also have
misc.languageCertification: Level B2 Complex Language Certificate in English

experience.head: Experience
experience.body: Take a look at my private projects!

footer.title: Contact me!
footer.footnote: If for some reason you wouldn't contact me, please let me know why since this is the way I can learn to be a better programmer!
footer.createdBy: This page was using Vite React 18 TypeScript and made by me.

strength.title: My Strengths
strength.footnote: I am always open to learn something new!
